text: Insey kaho, jo shaks gumraahi mein mubtila hota hai usey Rehman dheel diya karta hai, yahan tak ke jab aisey log woh cheez dekh letay hain jiska unse wada kiya gaya hai khwa woh azaab e ilahi ho ya qayamat ki ghadi tab unhein maloom ho jata hai ke kiska haal kharab hai aur kiska jattha (party) kamzor
